author: CBS News
title: Transcript: Scott Gottlieb on "Face the Nation"
description: The following is a transcript of an interview with former FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb that aired Sunday, April 12, 2020, on "Face the Nation."
content:
The following is a transcript of an interview with former FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb by CBS News' Margaret Brennan that aired Sunday, April 12, 2020, on "Face the Nation." 
MARGARET BRENNAN: Former FDA commissioner Dr. Scott Gottlieb has been helping us… [+9157 chars]
